metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating that Stearns read the letter of August 11th with care. Stearns states that he is not able to take up the the matter up with Luk (not arriving at Dummer Academy for summer term)  at present. Stearns will  impress upon Luk the importance of making effort to straighten the tangle. Stearns is extremely sorry for Luk's failure in fulfilling these business arrangements. At same time not sure that failure is any greater for Chinese boys than for American boys.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
